CpsDataUpdatedEvent.description: The payload for CPS data updated event.

schema.description: The schema, including its version, that this event adheres to. E.g. 'urn:cps:org.onap.cps:data-updated-event-schema:v99'.

id.description: The unique id identifying the event for the specified source. Producer must ensure that source + id is unique for each distinct event.

source.description: The source of the event. Producer must ensure that source + id is unique for each distinct event.

observedTimestamp.description: The timestamp when the data has been observed. The expected format is 'yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ'. Ex: '2020-12-01T00:00:00.000+0000'

dataspaceName.description: The name of CPS Core dataspace the data belongs to.

schemaSetName.description: The name of CPS Core schema set the data adheres to.

anchorName.description: The name of CPS Core anchor the data is attached to.
